From the Ant documentation (a must read):

<junit printsummary="yes" fork="yes" haltonfailure="yes">
  <formatter type="plain"/>
  <test name="my.test.TestCase"/>
</junit>

Copy/pasting that and you have:

     <test name="TempTest"  outfile="result">

and not:

     <test name="D:/src/TempTest"  outfile="result">

Ah the power of reading!

-Vladimir
